summary: Thanks to a devastating nuclear war, a group of people find themselves crammed together in a house in rural Texas, struggling to cope with radiation poisoning, grief and the locals.
cast: C.J. Thomason|Monica Keena|Edward Furlong|Andre Royo|Cree Kelly|Jessie Rusu|Ross Britz|Tody Bernard|Kennon Kepper|William Baldwin|Randal Reeder|Bo Mitchell|Bobbi Sue Luther|Ted Ferguson|Alexander B. Williams|Shawn Michael|Brandon E. Brooks|Jonathan Camp|Kaleina Cordova|Luis Da Silva Jr.|Johnny Egan|Ashley Nicole Hudson|Shadoe Knight|Eva Ceja
title: Aftermath
